participant_1.background:
I want a place where I can feel safe and comfortable, and where I can be myself.
I loved watching my dog run around in the backyard.
I'm the only one in my family who has crazy hair.
I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books.
I wake up early to make breakfast for my brother before he leaves for the army.

participant_2.background:
Rita Hayworth is my idol and I like to work out to stay in shape.
My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.
my favorite genre of music is rock.
I like to play pretend with my daughter.
i recently had knee surgery.

content.text: I love staying in and drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books. I like to make breakfast for my brother before he leaves for the army in the morning.
That sounds really relaxing, I'm a huge fan of Rita Hayworth and I like to work out to stay in shape. What kind of mermaid books do you like to read?
I like to read books about mermaids who live in the ocean, but have to come up to the surface to breathe. Sometimes they get stranded and have to figure out how to get back to the ocean.
That sounds really interesting, I've never heard of a book like that before. What are some of your favorite local foods?
I love to eat locally sourced, organic food. I think it's the best way to eat healthy and support your local community.
I agree, I love to eat locally sourced food too. I think it tastes better and it's better for the environment.
I also love to play pretend with my daughter, she's the best! We have so much fun together.
That's so sweet, I love to play pretend with my kids too. It's a great way to bond and have fun.
I recently had knee surgery, so I'm trying to stay active but it's been a little tough.
Oh no, that's too bad. I hope you have a speedy recovery. I know how hard it can be to be on your feet all day.
Thanks, I appreciate it. I'm doing my best to stay positive.
That's all you can do. I'm sure you'll be back to your old self in no time
